name: Gauntlet of the Sleepy Sheepies
description:
You, a heavy sleeper, and your alarm clock, a loud machine, don't work well together. In fact, you are such a heavy sleeper that you have to literally fight your way out of your dream! Follow the boisterous alarm sound and disable its source, as the evil sleepy sheepies try to keep you trapped inside your dream. But you better hurry up, or else you'll be late for school/work/whatever other responsibilities people have!

Most audio was downloaded from https://www.zapsplat.com/
